content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Storage and Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (x=-11.5, y=-49.5) storing iron ore.
- Wooden chest at position (x=-10.5, y=-49.5) serving as a target for iron ore transfer.
- Repeated movement of iron ore from the chest at (x=-11.5, y=-49.5) to the chest at (x=-10.5, y=-49.5).

### Coal Storage and Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (x=54.5, y=-78.5) storing coal.
- Wooden chest at position (x=-10.5, y=-49.5) serving as a target for coal transfer.
- Repeated movement of coal from the chest at (x=54.5, y=-78.5) to the chest at (x=-10.5, y=-49.5).

### Iron Plate Production
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (x=-14.0, y=-49.0) producing iron plates.
- Inventory of the stone furnace indicates production of iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Full Errors
- Ensure that the target inventory has sufficient space before attempting to insert items. The repeated attempts to insert coal into the stone furnace at position (x=-14, y=-49) failed because the inventory was full (50/50 items). Consider removing items from the furnace or expanding storage capacity.

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- No utility functions have been defined or invoked in the given steps.

### Important Variables
- `iron_ore_chest_inventory`: Dict[str, int] - Tracks the inventory of iron ore in the chest at (x=-11.5, y=-49.5).
- `target_chest_inventory`: Dict[str, int] - Tracks the inventory of coal and iron ore in the chest at (x=-10.5, y=-49.5).
- `coal_chest_inventory`: Dict[str, int] - Tracks the inventory of coal in the chest at (x=54.5, y=-78.5).
- `stone_furnace_inventory`: Dict[str, int] - Tracks the inventory of iron plates in the stone furnace at (x=-14.0, y=-49.0).
